  • Method Details

    • update

      public void update(Island island, javafx.scene.Group group, javafx.scene.PointLight pointLight)
      Method to keep up the graphic version with the model island. Also it puts or removes the tower
      Parameters:
      island - Model island passed
      pointLight - The eventual point light to which subscribe the new students
      group - The eventual group to which add the new students

      Clears the island
      Parameters:

      group - The group to which unsubscribe tower and students

    • updateAnimation

      public void updateAnimation()
      Description copied from class: DrawableObject
      Method called to update every object animation if there is one. If not overrided the update animation makes a step forward to the next position inside the array of positions
      Overrides:
